# Education

```{r Education_data}
data <- rbind(
  tibble(
    what = "Psychology Doctorate, research profile (PhD)",
    when = "September 2018 - Present",
    with = "Université du Québec à Montréal",
    where = "Montréal, Québec, Canada",
    details = c("Thesis: The role of coping strategies and emotional regulation in resolving work-family conflict episodes", "Advisor: Professor Nathalie Houlfort", "(Note: Profile change from Clinical PsyD to Research PhD)")
  ),
  tibble(
    what = "Psychology Doctorate, clinical profile (PsyD)",
    when = "September 2018 - September 2024",
    with = "Université du Québec à Montréal",
    where = "Montréal, Québec, Canada",
    details = c("Schooling completed", "(Note: All courses necessary for OPQ eligibility completed prior to transfer)")
  ),
  tibble(
    what = "Bachelor's degree in psychology (B.Sc.)",
    when = "September 2015 - September 2018",
    with = "Université du Québec à Montréal",
    where = "Montréal, Québec, Canada",
    details = "Honor thesis (supervised by Professor Robert J. Vallerand)"
  ),
  tibble(
    what = "Diploma of Collegial Studies (Social Sciences)",
    when = "September 2013 - September 2015",
    with = "Collège de Maisonneuve",
    where = "Montréal, Québec, Canada",
    details = "Special mention for involvement"
  )
)

nice_entries(data, language = language)
```
